lead_paragraph: Amid rising attacks on members of minority groups across the United States, refugees find themselves comparing the threats they fled to those that might still emerge.

headline.print_headline: Refugees Discover 2 Americas:  One That Hates, One That Heals
headline.main: Refugees Discover 2 Americas: One That Hates, and One That Heals

snippet: Amid rising attacks on members of minority groups across the United States, refugees find themselves comparing the threats they fled to those that might still emerge....
abstract: Many refugees in United States are confused by anti-immigrant and anti-Muslim sentiment on display during presidential election and its aftermath, with election of Donald Trump, and many instances of welcoming and support; while acts of intimidation and hate have spiked during campaign, they have been accompanied by public acts of solidarity and support, presenting refugees with dual image of country.
